altername_name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit
name: Sangokushi VI with Power-Up Kit
overview: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ," which was released in 1999 as the 6th game in the series. Romance of the Three Kingdoms 6 gives players the opportunity to build, manage and control an ancient Chinese fiefdom while interacting with and directing the actions of characters from the famous Romance of the Three Kingdoms epic. The goal is to unify the charred remains of this fragmented, war-torn land into a single empire stretching across the continent.
